greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Inverse of Riordan array (1/(1-x)^2,x(1-x)/(1+x)), A104698.
comment: Product of the Riordan array (1-xS(-x),xS(-x)) (inverse of Delannoy triangle) and the Riordan array (1-x,x) (first difference matrix). Row sums are A103137. Diagonal sums are (-1)^n*A103137(n+1) with g.f. (1-xS(-x))^2/(1-x^2S(-x)).
formula: Riordan array ((1-xS(-x))^2, xS(-x)) where S(x) is the g.f. of the large Schroeder numbers A006318.
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Jul 18 2005
